title: Bloomberg Markets: Fed Easing Isn't as Crazy as It Sounds
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Fed Easing Isn't as Crazy as It Sounds
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Danielle DiMartino Booth Former Adviser at the Dallas Federal Reserve Founder Money Strong Discussing how after putting the financial markets on high alert, central bankers have eased off their hawkish rhetoric to such an extent that some investors have begun to wonder whether the next major move might be an easing.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
